questions.question: I've just arrived here and I don't know what this is all about
questions.answer:
Welcome! We've been waiting for you. In fact, we have prepared some articles for you to get an idea on what POAP is:

The core value proposition of POAP:
[https://medium.com/@poap/the-core-value-proposition-of-poap-explained-dc379aca332d](https://medium.com/@poap/the-core-value-proposition-of-poap-explained-dc379aca332d)

What is POAP and how do I use it:
[https://tomso11.medium.com/what-is-poap-and-how-do-i-use-it-21ba692b918](https://tomso11.medium.com/what-is-poap-and-how-do-i-use-it-21ba692b918)

questions.question: What is POAP?
questions.answer:
POAP is a new way of keeping a reliable record of life experiences.

Each time they take part on an event, POAP collectors get a unique badge that is supported by a cryptographic record.

These badges are Non Fungible Tokens (NFT) and open a whole new world of possibilities.

questions.question: What is a NFT?
questions.answer: A NFT (Non-Fungible Token) is a digital representation that have properties that make them unique, this is to say that they are not interchangeable with other similar NFTs. These tokens can nevertheless be exchanged for other NFTs or valuables.

questions.question: Are POAPs bad for the environment?
questions.answer: No, POAPs are issued on a side chain that does not use overwhelming amount of electricity to function. In this way, we reduce significantly the environmental impact of our business operations.

questions.question: How do I pronounce POAP?
questions.answer: It's pronounced Poh-ap, not Pope.

questions.question: What is xDai?
questions.answer:
The xDai chain is a stable payments blockchain designed for fast and inexpensive transactions. POAP uses xDai to mint POAPs at a very low cost, so POAP can be free for everyone. 
There is more information available on the xDai Chain docs: [https://www.xdaichain.com/](https://www.xdaichain.com/)

questions.question: What is a chain?
questions.answer: A "chain" (short for blockchain) is a ledger of transactions distributed across an entire network in such a way that it makes it difficult to alter or change the records.

questions.question: How do I use POAP?
questions.answer:
There are two ways of using POAP, as an event organizer or as a collector.
As an event organizer, you can create events and distribute POAP to engage with your community.
As a collector, you can bookmark your life's greatest moments with a special record.

questions.question: What can I do with POAP?
questions.answer: POAPs allow you to record your life's experiences and engage with affinity groups.

questions.question: How do I learn about new events?
questions.answer: You can browse upcoming events by accessing [https://app.poap.xyz/admin/events](https://app.poap.xyz/admin/events)

questions.question: Claiming a POAP
questions.answer: When you assist a POAP sponsored event, the organizer will distribute claim codes in the shape of QR codes or URLS. Scan the QR or enter the URL in your browser to claim the POAP using your Ethereum/Celo address or email.

questions.question: I've assisted an event and didn't claim my POAP
questions.answer: Unfortunately we are not allowed to provide POAPs on behalf of the event organizers. In this case, you should reach out to the event organizer and prove that you attended the event to receive a POAP.

questions.question: How does claiming a POAP with my email work?
questions.answer:
If you claim a POAP with your email, we will save it for you until you decide to claim it with your Ethereum or Celo address. You will then have to enter [https://app.poap.xyz/scan/](https://app.poap.xyz/scan/) and enter your email. You will see your POAPs here, click on one and click the "Claim POAP" button. 
You will receive an email with a link that allows you to claim all of your pending POAPs with your Ethereum or Celo address.

questions.question: Can I sell my POAPs?
questions.answer: Although we do not recommend selling your life's bookmarks, you can do so by using [https://epor.io/](https://epor.io/help) on xDai and [https://opensea.io/](https://opensea.io/) on Ethereum.

questions.question: How do I know if my POAP is on Ethereum, Celo or xDai
questions.answer:
There are many ways to find this out. The easiest one is heading to [https://app.poap.xyz/scan/](https://app.poap.xyz/scan/) and input your Ethereum/Celo address/ENS to see your collection.
Click on the POAP you wish to know the residing network. If you scroll down and see the "Migrate" button, it means it's on xDai. Else, your POAP is on Ethereum or Celo.

questions.question: Why can't I see my POAP on Etherscan/Opensea?
questions.answer:
To make POAP free for collectors, POAPs are minted on the xDai chain, a sidechain of Ethereum.
As Etherscan and Opensea can only show what's on the Ethereum, you won't be able to see your POAP collection unless you migrate it to Ethereum (by paying the fees).

questions.question: Migrating a POAP to Ethereum
questions.answer:
In order to migrate a POAP from xDai to Ethereum, you should go to [https://app.poap.xyz/scan/](https://app.poap.xyz/scan/) and input your Ethereum Address/ENS to see your collection.
Once this is done select the POAP you wish to migrate, click it and scroll down until you see the "Migrate" button. Select the Ethereum box and click that button, you will be prompted to confirm a transaction. Keep in mind gas costs will be payed by the user.

questions.question: Migrating a POAP to Celo
questions.answer:
In order to migrate a POAP from xDai to Celo, you should go to [https://app.poap.xyz/scan/](https://app.poap.xyz/scan/) and input your Celo Address to see your collection.
Once this is done select the POAP you wish to migrate, click it and scroll down until you see the "Migrate" button. Select the Celo box and click that button, you will be prompted to confirm a transaction. Keep in mind gas costs will be payed by the user.

questions.question: Transferring POAPs from one address to another
questions.answer:
To transfer POAPs from one address to another you can use [https://unftwallet.xyz/](https://unftwallet.xyz/) .
You will have to connect your wallet and select the corresponding network (Celo, Ethereum or xDai) on your wallet.
Add the POAP contract which is already preloaded in the "Common" contract tab.
There you can select the POAP you want to transfer and enter the address to initiate the transaction.
If you are transacting on xDai, keep in mind that the transfer will be paid for in xDai token. If you do not hold funds on the xDai chain, you can use the following faucet to get funds and cover for the transfer: [https://www.xdaichain.com/for-users/get-xdai-tokens/xdai-faucet](https://www.xdaichain.com/for-users/get-xdai-tokens/xdai-faucet)

questions.question: Where can I see my collection?
questions.answer:
There are various ways in which you can see your POAP collection. 
You can go to [https://app.poap.xyz/scan/](https://app.poap.xyz/scan/) and enter your Ethereum/Celo address.
If you are on mobile, you may prefer using our mobile app called POAP wallet ([https://apps.apple.com/ar/app/poap-wallet/id1473716619](https://apps.apple.com/ar/app/poap-wallet/id1473716619)) or using Metamask Mobile. To see your POAPs on Metamask Mobile, please follow this guide: [https://tomso11.medium.com/how-to-see-your-poaps-on-metamask-bb85a82c617d](https://tomso11.medium.com/how-to-see-your-poaps-on-metamask-bb85a82c617d)

questions.question: How do I create an event?
questions.answer: You can create a POAP event by entering [https://app.poap.xyz/admin/events](https://app.poap.xyz/admin/events) and clicking on the "Create new POAP". Fill the form and you will receive an email with the next steps. Please be sure to comply with the image requirements outlined in the form.

questions.question: How much does it cost?
questions.answer: Nothing, all costs are covered by POAP so it's free both for organizers and end users.

questions.question: I've created an event, how do I get the claim codes?
questions.answer:
When you create an event, you will receive an email with the details of the event created. You can reply to that email with the amount of codes you need. Should you run out of codes, you can re-reply to that email requesting additional codes.
If for some reasons you do not receive your codes, please contact us through our Discord or Telegram channels.

questions.question: I've received my codes, what do I do with them?
questions.answer:
The codes you received can be distributed to each attendee on a one-by-one basis.
Codes can be distributed using our [Discord bot](https://github.com/poapxyz/poap-bot), via email using a mass emailing software system, using [POAP.delivery](https://poap.delivery/) if you collected your attendees Ethereum/Celo addresses or [POAP.websites](https://poap.websites/) if you wish to share a QR.
If you would like to set up a Delivery, Website or explore other distribution methods, please reach out to us using our Discord or Telegram channels.
For more information on responsible distribution, please read this article: [https://medium.com/@poap/the-core-value-proposition-of-poap-explained-dc379aca332d](https://medium.com/@poap/the-core-value-proposition-of-poap-explained-dc379aca332d)

questions.question: Can I track the redemptions of my event ?
questions.answer: Yes! You can use [https://poap.gallery/](https://poap.gallery/) to track the addresses that claimed POAPs for your event.

questions.question: Can I modify an already created event ?
questions.answer:
You can modify every characteristic of an event provided that less than 30 days have passed since the start date of the event.

In order to modify it, you should head to [https://app.poap.xyz/admin/events/](https://app.poap.xyz/admin/events/) and look for your event. Click on the "Edit" icon on the right of the row and modify the event. Don't forget to enter the Edit Code received via email when the event was created.

questions.question: Can POAPs be animated ?
questions.answer: POAPs can only be still images for the time being. We are working on allowing this feature for all organizers in the short term.

questions.question: I am receiving an error when creating my event
questions.answer: If you uploaded an image, please ensure that it is in png format, 500x500 and less than 200kb in size. If the issue persists, please reach out to us through our Discord or Telegram channels.

questions.question: Can I create a test event to get familiar with the platform?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We encourage organizers to do so.

questions.question: I'm organizing an in-person event, can I use POAP ?
questions.answer: Of course, that is what POAP was made for. Claim links may be distributed as QR codes or many other ways. Please reach out to us through our communication channels (Discord or Telegram) so we can explore your particular case.

questions.question: I want to develop a custom way to distribute POAP
questions.answer: We welcome and support anyone who is interested in integrating with POAP. Please reach out to us through our communication channels (Discord or Telegram) to explore possibilities.
